name: Vetala
description: The Vetala is a medium-sized demon with a sinister connection to death and undeath, possessing remarkable agility and resilience.
memorable: It has the ability to raise corpses to serve it and can command them effectively in combat.
goals: To summon undead and control them, using them to fulfill its chaotic evil agenda.
relations: It is often associated with graveyard creatures and undead, exerting control over them.
environment: Thrives in darkness, graveyards, and necropolises.
strengths: High Dexterity and Constitution along with Magic Resistance grants it resilience against spells.
attacks: Uses claws to deal slashing and necrotic damage; can raise undead minions.
most_powerful_ability: Master of Undeath allows any humanoid it kills to rise as undead under its control.
senses: It has darkvision and a passive perception score of 16, enabling it to notice hidden threats effectively.
skills: It has proficiency in Perception, allowing it to notice hidden enemies.
additional_information: Can teleport between corpses with Corpse Stride.
Moves effortlessly in graveyards with Graveyard Walker ability.
Commands undead minions with extra necrotic damage through Shepherd of Death.
Can trigger explosive reactions with Corpse Detonation when its undead are defeated.
Can animate corpses as skeletons or zombies.
